text: Allah ta’ala tumhe tumhaari aulaad ke baare mein hukm karta hai ke ek ladke ka hissa do ladkiyo ke baraabar hai aur agar sirf ladkiya hee ho, aur do se zyaada ho to unhe maal matruka5 ka do-tihaayi milega, aur agar ek hee ladki ho, to us ke liye adhaa hai aur mayyath ke maa baap mein se har ek ke liye us ke chohde hoye maal ka cheta hissa hai, agar us ki (mayyath) ki aulad ho,aur agar aulaad na ho aur maa baap waaris hote ho to us ki maa ke liye tisra hissa hai,haan agar mayyath ke kayi bhai ho to phir us ki maa ka cheta hissa hai,ye hisse us wasiyath (ki takmil) ke baadh hai jo marne waala kar gaya ho, ya adhaaye qarz ke baadh, tumhaare baap ho ya tumhaare bete,tumhe nahi maalom ke un mein kaun tumhe nafa pahochaane mein zyaada qareeb hai,ye hisse Allah ta’ala ki taraf se muqarrar karda hai,beshak Allah ta’ala pure ilm aur kaamil hikmato waala hai
